name: bandcamp_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Bandcamp in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. More efficient than calling bandcamp_search multiple times. Pass all search queries as a single comma-separated string.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'aphex twin, boards of canada, autechre')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.result-items li.searchresult').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 10) { const info = el.querySelector('.result-info'); const titleEl = info?.querySelector('.heading a'); const typeEl = info?.querySelector('.itemtype'); const urlEl = info?.querySelector('.itemurl a'); const subheadEl = info?.querySelector('.subhead'); const genreEl = info?.querySelector('.genre'); const artEl = el.querySelector('.art img'); results.push({ name: titleEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: urlEl?.textContent?.trim() || titleEl?.href || '', type: typeEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', subhead: subheadEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', genre: genreEl?.textContent?.trim().replace(/^genre:\s*/i, '') || '', image: artEl?.src || '' }); } }); const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || decodeURIComponent(window.location.search.replace('?q=', '')), result_count: results.length, results };
detailSteps.name: results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
